channel.title: Deleting objects
channel.description: I'm not a very good coder.. and I don't know too much. So, I was wondering if there is a way you can make a command delete objects, such as stalagmites or bank booths. If anyone can help, thanks.

item.title: Deleting objects
item.dc:creator: @David_L_F David_L_F
item.description:
@David_L_F wrote:

Aha, thank you :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 02:25:46 pm[/size][hr]Can someone tell me where to put this code? Again, not a great coder. And excuse my double postieness.

item.title: Deleting objects
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

public void delObj(int objectX, int objectY) { ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 10); }

public void loadObjects() { delObj(x, y); }

Also call the ‘loadObjects’ method in packet 121.
